entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
